# Extreme Flexibility (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[2nd Level Alchemist Spells|Alchemist 2]], [[2nd Level Bloodrager Spells|Bloodrager 2]], [[2nd Level Magus Spells|Magus 2]], [[2nd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 2]], [[2nd Level Witch Spells|Witch 2]], [[2nd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 3rd-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 3]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** You

**Duration:** 1 minute/level

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Advanced Class Guide, pg. 181

You gain a +1 dodge bonus to AC, a +4 circumstance bonus on [[Escape Artist (Skill)|Escape Artist]] checks and combat maneuver checks to grapple, and +4 circumstance bonus to your CMD against grapple attempts.
